title: Koha Ginjiro (Trusty Ginjiro)
synopsis: After the death of his elder brother, Ginjiro Yamazaki appoints himself his parents' protector. After transferring to a new school, he gets into a lot of fights.
staff: [['Motomiya, Hiroshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Kanayama, Akihiro', ['Character Design']], ['Arai, Torao', ['Art Director']]]
